text: int scan_positive ( int * a ) { int x = 0 ; register int c = getchar_unlocked ( ) ; for ( ; c > 47 && c < 58 ; c = getchar_unlocked ( ) ) { x = ( x << 1 ) + ( x << 3 ) + c - 48 ; } * a = x ; } int main ( void ) { int t , n ; scan_positive ( & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scan_positive ( & n ) ; int a [ n ] ; int mincost ; int i = 1 ; scan_positive ( & mincost ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scan_positive ( & a [ i ] ) ; if ( a [ i ] < mincost ) mincost = a [ i ] ; } printf ( "%lld\n" , ( ( long long ) mincost ) * ( n - 1 ) ) ; } return 0 ; }
